Ku dilambung angan-angan Belaian kasih sayang suci darimu Oh kejamnya Lidah tidak bertulang Ucapan cinta menghiris kalbu Ku kan pergi membawa diri Cinta di hati terkubur lagi Tidak ku fahami Mengapa terjadi Peristiwa pahit mengguris hati Jalanan hidup ini Sudah tertulis Kutempuhi dengan kesabaran Kusedar kebesaranMu Tuhan... im feelin so damn down..sweet talks are bullshit!!reali!!they are juz plain words which cums out straight frm e mouth but not frm e hart!!i hate guys hu tell me that he missed me but at e same tym,he says that to other girls also.freakin "fish" ryt?!i mean lyk..wad e fish?!quit playin games wif my hart n stop all dat sweet talks guys!!if u dun mean wad u say,way in e werl say it?!girls r not dolls ayts..guys..u tink u hv a whole lot collection of "dolls"(girls u mean)..dis wk,u "play" wif doll A,nex week..u tell doll B that u misses her!!ouh gosh!!wad is dis all abt?!it goes on and on..dun u tink before u say sth??damnit!!im exagerattin..i noe..sori if i offended u guys in sum ways..im juz so lost..be honest guys..even if u dun wanna hurt ya fren's feelin(a fren of e opposite sex)..juz b honest..e truth hurts but its better to noe e truth soon rather den ltr...

*yawn*..im lyk haf awake n haf asleep now..waitin for my bro to cum hm!!da lamer tk jumpe dier!!hehe..actuali,he's back arady.juz came back.he's in e toilet now..*yawn*..im so damn tired..practised frm mornin to aftann..den wen to e beach to meet my family der..wen off frm e beach ard 8.30pm..reached hm..at 9+..switched on e comp,wen online..chatted wif yat n my Gfs..wadeva "fish" la..im still awake now(haf awake..)coz i juz finished watchin e TeeBee..(tv..yesh..i meant dat)watched wrestling n e show afta dat..it was "e wadsoeva life"[i dunno la wad life]..orytz..if u dun understand wad im sayin,forgive me..told ya im haf asleep n haf awake..so im lyk typin dis thingy wif my eyes haf open n closed..*grinz*..*yawn*..b4 i doze off infront of dis comp..i better end evrything.nytz to myself...ZzzZZzz (signin off..babykraze..011289..\m/..zzZZzzZZ)

freak!!kena screen by police juz now...freak la...cnfirm die la.we were wearing our sch uni but we wasnt makin a nuisance of ourselves!!stupid resident!!wadeva la..fish!!urgh!!but today's pract was fun!!lots of laughter bcoz of shane n imran..hehe...dey dance very cute sia..reali..hehe..shud c dem dance...damn cute!!hehe...i reached hm at 8.25pm..late uh?!hehe..k-siao sia me..hw still haben do..hehe..im feelin so down now..listenin to e sg,"from e bottom of my broken heart"..feel like burstin into tears..but haiz..wad for??over a song??it isnt an ordinary song..it got it's own meanin..n it meant alot to me..wad crap m i tokin sia...hehe...0kok..so my new nick is like.."shorty"..coz im like so small among my classmates..im not growing sia!!!im so freakin bored la...n sleepy..ok la..till here aytz.. cutelicious lil'baby signin off..."im not a girl,not yet a woman"..

[woke up at 12.05pm] so sleepy..watched 50 first dates at 1.25am till 3.25..i think..i slept at ard 3.40..got nth to do.juz finished wif abg's hw..helped him to type out sth.it's gonna rain so..hopefully.damn it!i cun sign in to my a/c(msn i mean).."fish"!!im so damn bored!!still haven done my maths hw.im done wif art assignment.urgh!!still cnt go online!!fish lar!!wad norton antivirus..freaking lame.ish..gtg..wanna restart the comp..

life is beautiful..reali?i hope it is..for me.im so cheerful dis paz few days n yah..like ive said,im oso a gd pretender.i can b cheerful n sad st e same tym but i dun show it to ppl.for wad ryt??w/ther im happy or sad..hu cares??ryt??i cun hold back my tears like how i fight wif my fears.[im walkin away..from troubles in my life..]but i didnt mean to way away from u n pretend dat i dun noe u..haiz...pening uh kepala.had,kar,izza is at my hse now..waitin for naz n shar..for dance pract.SIANZ!!!!!

'typed' a testi for mad..pathetic la u..add more frens ya!!hehe..was chattin wit my clazmates wen abg got back.he signed me out of msn n signed in into his...abg eman's camera was wif him as he wanted to transfer his pics all to e comp...den afta all dat transferin.hehe...we took pics of ourselves..cute seh sum of e pics...hehe...i reali love my bro..esp if he's in e giler2 m0od..reali..afta takin pics,we transfered e pics 2 e c0mp..besh seh..wish we g0t dat camera..actuali ader digi cam..juz dat we dun hav e card..hehe..ryts..we luffed n j0ked at each other..he signed in into my a/c...wif my concern n permission la...few pr0bs happen..0r may i say misunderstandingS??i dunn0 uh eh..but wadeva it is...i typed everyting...yesh i did..u ppl hu r readin dis n dun reali understand..nvm..its 0k..forget wad im 'crappin' abt....den my parents alek...bbl wit dem..abg showed his graff to mummy dear..n mummy dear showed it to papa dear..hehe...very impressin!!so proud of my br0..hehe..reali pr0ud la..i slept ar0und 11pm..c0z i was s0 damn tired..in e aftern0on had e nati0nal day trainin..tiring sia...but ok la..wen back ar0und 6.40 after a meetin wit e gerls....phew..pnat gegerl type..hehe... ayts..dats all dat happened yesterday...n for today..i dun reali n0e wad t0 wryt la..mayb t0night i'll update wad happened t0day...but s0 far..hehe..i fell d0wn juz now..0utside skul!!hahahakz..luckily n0one was ar0und...!!LoL..farni sia..mcm2 uH..hehe...but n0w i dunn0 y im feelin so d0wn..haiz..asal ekh??geram p0n ader..aiy0z...wad can i say...tu je la..b back t0 update m0re.. signin off.."sweet talks are bullshit..neva trust dem..(C)2004 carpediembaby15"
